changed_products.title: Kaymet CR1 Coaster with Rubber Grip

description:
Made by Perfumer H (London, UK)

Perfumer: Lyn Harris

A humid rain cloud of sultry white florals. Ylang ylang absolute (Island of Reunion), vetiver, angelica grain and vanilla bourbon in accord with a fresh garden bouquet of jasmine (Egypt), orange flower (Tunisia) and cassis (France) with iris absolute (China), resting on a bed of white musks and amber to create a true olfactory landscape.

Notes: Bergamot, Mandarin Italy, Orange Flower Absolute, Ylang Ylang Absolute Island of Reunion, Angelica, Vetiver Haiti, Vanilla Bourbon





















 



 



UK & International delivery
View delivery options

Click & Collect
Available from our studio

changed_products.title: Dak - Milky Cake 250g (Advanced & Controlled Fermentation Castillo, Colombia)

description:
Made by Perfumer H (London, UK)

Perfumer: Lyn Harris

The intoxicating rush of new leather with an irresistibly clean finish. Lavender (France), bergamot (Italy) and birch tar with a heart of rose essence, iris absolute and cardamom seed on a base of cedar and oak moss.

Notes: Bergamot Italy, Lavender France, Birch Tar, Rose Turkey, Iris Absolute China, Cardamom Seed, Sandalwood Indonesia, Cedar Wood Virginia, Oak Moss, Cade

Click & Collect

The intoxicating rush of new leather with an irresistibly clean finish. Lavender (France), bergamot (Italy) and birch tar with a heart of rose essence, iris absolute and cardamom seed on a base of cedar and oak moss.

Made by Perfumer H (London, UK)

Perfumer: Lyn Harris

The smell of the air after burning wood is fused with damp earth, wild herbs and clean spices to create a masterfully unique amber. Top notes of geranium (Egypt), cistus and coriander seed (Russia) with a heart of chamomile (Morocco), rose (Turkey) and cardamom on a smouldering base of birch tar, agar, cedar wood (Atlas) and santal Mysore, with warming resins of benjoin and frankincense.

Notes: Coriander Seed, Angelica Grain, Rose Essence Turkey, Chamomile Morocco, Frankincense Somalia, Agar Wood, Santal Mysore, Cedar Wood Morocco, Birch Tar, Cade





















 



 



UK & International delivery
View delivery options

Click & Collect
Available from our studio

changed_products.title: Ashley & Co Soothe Tube 75ml Christmas Edition
Ashley & Co Lip Punch Christmas Edition 15ml

description:
Made by Perfumer H (London, UK)

Perfumer: Lyn Harris

Distinctive to all who wear it, the cerebral scent of blue ink on white paper conjures late nights in dimly lit libraries. Papyrus India, vetiver Haiti and cedar wood fused with elemi Iran and rose, with hints of ambroxan and isobutyl quinoline.

Notes: Elemi Iran, Black Pepper, Rose Absolute Turkey, Vetiver Haiti, Patchouli Indonesia, Papyrus India, Cedar Wood Virginia, Frankincense Somalia, Ambroxan

Made by Perfumer H (London, UK)

Perfumer: Lyn Harris

Made to honour the jewel of all citruses, this cologne cleans and refreshes with a brush of sophistication. Bergamot (Calabria), which brings balance and beauty to all my colognes, is fused with clean aldehydes, petitgrain (Paraguay) and lemon (Sicily). Warm clove and frankincense rest on juniper wood and a smudge of tonka (Venezuela) with a sprinkling of lavender (France).

Notes: Bergamot Calabria, Lemon Sicily, Neroli Tunisia, Aldehydes, Clove, Frankincense, Juniper Wood, Tonka Venezuela





















 



 



UK & International delivery
View delivery options

Click & Collect
Available from our studio
